title: Netflix
description: Netflix clone website, crafted with HTML and CSS, mirrors the familiar interface of Netflix. Users can explore content, browse movie posters, and experience a mini-Netflix right in their browser.

title: Tic Tac Toe
description: A classic Tic Tac Toe game. This project helped me learn a lot about modules, IIFEs, closures, and scope in JavaScript.

title: Weather
description: I made this project while learning about APIs. While making this project along with APIs concept I also implemented promises concept in JavaScript. This project utilizes two APIs, one for the weather data and another for the background image.
